item.description:
Hi everyone! Val and John Lund are planning a meetup for a Providence Bruins game.

They need minimum 10 people for $13 seats to pre-pay for the Feb. 19 Friday night game. It starts at 7:05pm.

Please find John Lund (tall with beard) at Loie Fullers next Monday to give him your dineros. Or you can contact him via Meetup/email to arrange payment. They must tell the box office we are coming asap, and pay in full at least a week ahead of time.

These are prime seats behind a goal and the glass, about 8 rows from the ice.

Please email Val or John if you have any questions.

Thanks!!
item.name: P Bruins Game!
